abstract: American Express is the latest big financial services company to equalize the cost of health insurance for its employees with same-sex partners.
snippet: American Express is the latest big financial services company to equalize the cost of health insurance for its employees with same-sex partners.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: American Express is the latest company to equalize the cost of health insurance benefits for heterosexual employees and employees with same-sex partners.

headline.main: Amex Equalizes Health Costs for Gay Employees
